commit message: Removed 'ignore translation' in strings.xml

Opens the MainActivity when the notification is pressed

Do not crash if the notification doesn't get a current playing item

merge master branch

Merge branch 'master' into googlecast

more reliable progress indicator
The chromecast is initialized with the offset from the device
